items.title: Its time to say goodbye to docker
items.description: I always considered docker to be the only tool for containerisation. For my home server I have been using docker-compose and never did I even think about an alternative. This article does a good job of listing and explaining alternatives to docker. My next project for my home server is to migrate to k3s using kompose

Carbon Design System is a great example when working on your design system and guidelines. When designing a new component, I often do some research about UX and how things should look; this is one of the places I go to and read their documentation. They also have a Storybook (React, Vue.js and Angular), so when developing, I sometimes check that out as well.
items.title: Carbon Design System

items.description: It's no secret that listening and playing music is a passion. Discovering new music is absolutely part of that. I mainly discover this new music through the website dansendeberen.be, where new reviews are posted every day. Not only from the big bands, but also from the local scene.
items.title: Dansende beren
Epic React
items.description: This month I got introduced to Epic React. Wheelhouse gave me the opportunity to give it a try and holy it's amazing!

author: Wheelhouse
title: Our picks going into December
introduction: These are some links that we found the most interesting going into december. Each month we pick 1 thing we found very interesting and put it into a list. This list might give you some insight in how Wheelhouse thinks and what intrigues us.
description: Every month we each pick somethign that we would like to share to the world.
